products.title: Origin, Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin, Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

products.title: Origin, Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

products.title: Magnum, Taupe - Day Night Blind
products.description: A gorgeous fusion of chocolate and cream threads, the magnum in taupe looks both natural and stylish. Of course, it's also amazingly practical, with versatile privacy and light control that can be easily adjusted to your will. Use the taupe in an all-white living room, where light and airiness are your top priorities. Fill the room with natural, naked woods, both light and medium, and organic fabrics such as hessian and wicker, finishing the room off with a woven jute rug.

products.title: Shine, Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: For a silver that isn't a bold, modern metallic, go for the shine in grey, which displays a pale, shimmering tone that reflects the light and offers a subtle hint of glamour. The look is made streamlined by the hidden controls, which sit in the overhead rail cassette for usable functionality. Complement a bold navy colour scheme in the dining room by including the grey, which will look striking and impactful against a dark blue wall.

products.title: Nightshade, Mist - Day Night Blind
products.description: In pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are neatly hidden from view in the blind's rail cassette, from which the blind hangs neatly and easily. Use the mist to complement a petrol blue and soft grey colour scheme in a contemporary living room, where it will look striking against a blue feature wall.

products.title: Origin, Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is you are guaranteed to appreciate the workmanship that goes into every square inch. The ability to give your room the perfect light levels all day long makes your kitchen a fantastic choice for origin grey.

products.title: Origin, Taupe - Vista Blind
products.description: A light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing but understated luxury to your home. If you want to give your home a touch of rustic country with a modern twist there is no better addition to make to your home than origin taupe.

products.title: Nightshade, Chrome - Day Night Blind
products.description: In silky silver, the nightshade in chrome offers not only style but versatile practicality too. In between the cool grey, double layered fabric sit sliding translucent strips, which can be moved up and down to ensure flexible light control. Combine the chrome with a contemporary all-white kitchen, foregoing conventional colour and opting for a stark look full of clean lines and sharp metallics. Keep the base of the room white, and choose chrome fixtures, fittings, and appliances for a distinct and stunning aesthetic.

products.title: Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind
products.description: In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights. Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room.

products.title: Bayham, Pewter - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham pewter combines a modern colour with the latest in elegant contemporary design. The gentle hanging voile panels serve as the perfect lens through which to view the deep tone of pewter as you control the ambience in your home with ease like never before. Pewter lends an authentically natural colour to the modern home and allows you to create a theme around stone and wood finishes. Slate floors or small touches like table mats and coasters really come together in the dining room.

products.title: Bayham, Taupe Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you adjust the angle of the finely woven fabric to give the perfect light level for any occasion. We love the look of taupe grey in the kitchen or a cosy cottage style living room. Woods, slate, the fireplace, no matter what authentic style you decide to pair it with you are guaranteed to create a harmony with the existing decor whilst adding the modern touch of their unique vista style.

products.title: Natura, Mist - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura mist combines a lightweight and elegant voile and a richly detailed fabric that immerses your senses to create a modern addition that adds to any home. With a level of craftsmanship and care that is unrivalled, the mist fabric is integrated with the voile panels so that you have complete control of the light in your home. A unique blend of the aesthetic and functional worlds. Mist captures the imagination by taking your eye on a journey through a whole spectrum of colours and tones.
